nodes.bodyText: Make this changes after: if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(folderPath)) condition

Create variable for accountingBatch.getPaymentMode() and use everywhere in method
Update Preconditions.checkArgument to check paymentMode.getBankOrderExportFolderPath() is not null
Also update path displayed on error message
Move this line of code to starting of the method

Move this line of code to starting of the method
and check with append File.separator in same line of code
Move this line of code to starting of the method

Better to keep this Preconditions.checkArgument after catch block and check one more condition in it:
bankOrderExportPath != null && new File(dataExpotDir + File.separator...
we can't move this condition to after catch block because it uses dataExpotDir variable and it must have to stay inside the try block as dataExpotDir is not accessible outside of try block.
Move this line of code to starting of the method

Case when dataExportDir != null && indicatorGeneratorGrouping.getPath() == null:
In CsvTool.csvWriter() method's parameter you should pass filePath = null so it will throw IOException and we already have catch block for it
Pass null value in parameter if accountConfig.getReimbursementImportFolderPathCFONB() is null
Pass null value in parameter if accountConfig.getTempReimbImportFolderPathCFONB() is null

There is no need to do any change here as you can check the returned value is not used anywhere, this method is just used to throw exception if accountConfig.getReimbursementExportFolderPath() is null

Optimize these lines of code, you can do the same by just one line of code
Same in getFileUploadDir() method

No need to create a variable for dataExportDir
Simply, return appService.getDataExportDir() + folderPath;
